comprehensive overview: Integrative Genomics Viewer (IGV) is a high-performance genomics visualization tool that allows users to explore and analyze large-scale genomics data interactively. It is widely used in genomics research for visualizing genetic variants, gene expression, and epigenetic data.
core features: Visualization of genomics data with interactive features
Support for genetic variants, gene expression, and epigenetic data
Advanced plotting and data exploration capabilities
